meanings.sent1: I enjoy phoning my grandma every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: She is phoning her friend to invite her to the party.
meanings.sent3: After phoning the pizza place, we realized we had the wrong number!
meanings.sent4: The sound of phoning birds filled the air with music.
meanings.sent5: Phoning the emergency services saved the day.

meanings.definition: The act of using a telephone to communicate with someone.
meanings.sent1: Phoning is a convenient way to stay in touch with friends.
meanings.sent2: I heard the phoning of the receptionist in the office.
meanings.sent3: The phoning of the telemarketer interrupted our dinner.
meanings.sent4: The phoning of the old rotary phone brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The phoning of the alarm system alerted the security guard.
